Pre-Game Insights: The New York Yankees and Chicago Cubs are set to meet on September 7, 2024, at Wrigley Field.
Javier Assad and Clarke Schmidt will be the starting pitchers for the Cubs and Yankees, respectively.
Betting odds for the game are Chicago Cubs +120 / New York Yankees -141, with an Over/Under of 7.
Others: The game will be broadcast on MARQUEE and YES.
